files.patch:
@@ -218,1 +218,1 @@ - * {@code BigDecimal}'s natural ordering is inconsistent + * {@code BigDecimal}'s {@linkplain compareTo(BigDecimal) natural ordering} is inconsistent @@ -3144,1 +3144,11 @@ - * method. + * method since the former has [{@code BigInteger}, + * {@code scale}] components equal to [20, 1] while the latter has + * components equals to [200, 2]. + * + *

One example that shows how 2.0 and 2.00 are not + * substitutable for each other under some arithmetic operations + * either are the two expressions:
+ * {@code new BigDecimal("2.0" ).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(3), + * HALF_UP)} which evaluates to 0.7 and
+ * {@code new BigDecimal("2.00").divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(3), + * HALF_UP)} which evaluates to 0.67.
